body:
Basically, how this works is simple. 
Each person says "On the _____ day of christmas, my true love sent to me, _______________"

Example: On the first day of chrismtas, my true love sent to me, 150 cherry apples
Then you do
On the second day of chrismtas, my true love sent to me, 149 brown cows


LETS DO THIS
Start off with the 3rd day of christmas
you may only post every 25 posts
